    About Us

    Point-of-sale consumer financing solutions designed for you

    AnyDay Cash USA’s point-of-sale merchant financing for customers platform was designed for ease of use. For merchants, that means the opportunity for more approvals, fewer fees, and faster payment. For a period of 6 months to 60 months at ARP from 7 to 33.09% depending on the amount and the period with no extra Charges.

    Financing important moments in life

    AnyDay Cash USA’s point-of-sale customer financing solution gives your business a better payment solution.

    [vc_column_text woodmart_color_scheme=”dark” woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px” woodmart_hide_large=”0″ woodmart_hide_medium=”0″ woodmart_hide_small=”0″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1629289581048{padding-top: 0px !important;}” mobile_bg_img_hidden=”no” tablet_bg_img_hidden=”no” woodmart_parallax=”0″ woodmart_sticky_column=”false” parallax_scroll=”no” mobile_reset_margin=”no” tablet_reset_margin=”no” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″ wd_z_index=”no” woodmart_css_id=”611cfc6bd9eaf” responsive_spacing=”eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2MTFjZmM2YmQ5ZWFmIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoidmNfY29sdW1uIiwiZGF0YSI6eyJ0YWJsZXQiOnt9LCJtb2JpbGUiOnt9fX0=”]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Services

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1709910775012{margin-top: 50px !important;}” woodmart_css_id=”65eb2aef25b1e” responsive_spacing=”eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2NWViMmFlZjI1YjFlIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoidmNfcm93IiwiZGF0YSI6eyJ0YWJsZXQiOnt9LCJtb2JpbGUiOnt9fX0=” mobile_bg_img_hidden=”no” tablet_bg_img_hidden=”no” woodmart_parallax=”0″ woodmart_gradient_switch=”no” woodmart_box_shadow=”no” wd_z_index=”no” woodmart_disable_overflow=”0″ row_reverse_mobile=”0″ row_reverse_tablet=”0″][vc_column width=”1/2″]

    Lower merchant fees

    We don’t charge any fees for sign-up or membership. Plus, promotional financing is included at no extra cost to you. Because growing your business should never come with high fees.

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

    More approvals

    We approve loans for higher ticket goods and services in a variety of industries we serve. Because when borrowers have greater purchasing power, it can lead to higher returns for you.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

    Instant pre-approval decisions

    Our proprietary technology combines established best practice with advanced underwriting and fraud detection. That means on-the-spot-decisions, with no impact on a borrower’s credit score to see if they’re pre-approved.

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

    Faster funding

    We pay your business within days of the borrower signing the contract. Because faster payments lead to healthier cash flow – which can lead to better cash flow for your business.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section][vc_row][vc_column]

    Industries we serve

    We provide merchant financing for customers for a variety of niche industries
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

    Instant Loans

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

    Payday Loan

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

    Mortage Loan

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

    Automobile Loan

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

    Medical Loan

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

    Tourism Loan

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1629289864634{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}” mobile_bg_img_hidden=”no” tablet_bg_img_hidden=”no” woodmart_parallax=”0″ woodmart_gradient_switch=”no” row_reverse_mobile=”0″ row_reverse_tablet=”0″ woodmart_disable_overflow=”0″ el_id=”Testimonials” wd_z_index=”no” woodmart_css_id=”611cfd846b2d1″ responsive_spacing=”eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2MTFjZmQ4NDZiMmQxIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoidmNfcm93IiwiZGF0YSI6eyJ0YWJsZXQiOnt9LCJtb2JpbGUiOnsibWFyZ2luLWJvdHRvbSI6IjQwIn19fQ==”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1709900466338{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” mobile_bg_img_hidden=”no” tablet_bg_img_hidden=”no” woodmart_parallax=”0″ woodmart_sticky_column=”false” parallax_scroll=”no” mobile_reset_margin=”no” tablet_reset_margin=”no” woodmart_css_id=”65eb02a592f3a” wd_collapsible_content_switcher=”no” wd_column_role_offcanvas_desktop=”no” wd_column_role_offcanvas_tablet=”no” wd_column_role_offcanvas_mobile=”no” wd_column_role_content_desktop=”no” wd_column_role_content_tablet=”no” wd_column_role_content_mobile=”no” woodmart_box_shadow=”no” responsive_spacing=”eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2NWViMDJhNTkyZjNhIiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoidmNfY29sdW1uIiwiZGF0YSI6eyJ0YWJsZXQiOnt9LCJtb2JpbGUiOnt9fX0=” wd_z_index=”no”]
    TESTIMONIALS

    Customer Reviews

    They have already used our services
    Kristin Watson
    I highly recommend Anyday Cash USA for lending services. It’s the tool that takes you to the next level in arranging those services stress-free and worry-free.
    Ronald Richards
    My experience was great. I’m very happy with my results and would recommend Anyday Cash USA to my family and friends. My loan was approved so fast; it didn’t take weeks at all.
      [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

      Reach Us @ + 1 (725) 605 8524
